about_the_game:
ABOUT

In the world of Grundlewhack, the genres of comedy and fantasy come together for a steamy one-night stand. This erotic tale follows three wizarding school dropouts on their quest to take this magical world for their own.

With real choices to be made, Grundlewhack is an experience of branching paths and hidden secrets. What story will you tell in this whacky, sexy world of magic?

GAMEPLAY

Grundlewhack features an innovative dialogue-based choice system where clues and insights that branch your story are found directly in the words spoken. If someone says something that raises an eyebrow or raises something else, click on the word to see how it may change your story.

This game also features a rotating roster of 3 main characters, so you’ll always be playing as someone with different motivations and quirks than the character before! It’s exciting stuff that’s driven our writer absolutely mad! Check it out!

CHARACTERS

RECTOR ROCKSTEADY


He’s cocky and a little bit spoiled, but getting expelled has made Rector Rocksteady really take another look at himself...if only to make sure he still looks good.

VALORA TWEED



She’s prim and proper--Val is a real “by the book” type. But since her studies are focused on demonic worship, “by the book” pretty much means “here’s how to set the world on fire.” Come along as Val sets the realm ablaze.

ROONEY SUMMERSHANDY





Rooney is the kindest, most well-meaning mad scientist in the realm. She’s tenacious too, and she’ll never take no for an answer, even if it’s being painfully screamed at her!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features Nudity, Consensual Sex, Language and drug and alcohol consumptions.

name: Grundlewhack - Season 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i3-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphic Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5500 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
